channel.title: [PI] NPC Help. Rep++
channel.description: Just a little help, acctually pretty simple but I'm too busy with homework atm to do it myself. I just added a "Lottery" Onto my server, so I added an NPC that tells the player all about the lottery, but how to I get the npc to take away the players' money and then give them the ticket?

item.title: [PI] NPC Help. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:

Just a little help, acctually pretty simple but I’m too busy with homework atm to do it myself. I just added a “Lottery” Onto my server, so I added an NPC that tells the player all about the lottery, but how to I get the npc to take away the players’ money and then give them the ticket?
